table:columns.name: shoreline_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for the shoreline segment.

table:columns.name: datetime
table:columns.description: Timestamp of the shoreline observation.

table:columns.name: otsu_threshold
table:columns.description: Threshold value determined by Otsu's method for water detection.

table:columns.name: otsu_separability
table:columns.description: Separability score for land-water classification using Otsu's method.

table:columns.name: sinuosity
table:columns.description: Sinuosity of the shoreline segment.

table:columns.name: self_intersection_density
table:columns.description: Density of self-intersections in the shoreline geometry.

table:columns.name: fractal_dimension
table:columns.description: Fractal dimension of the shoreline geometry.

table:columns.name: filter_length
table:columns.description: Length of the applied filter in the shoreline extraction process.

table:columns.name: filter_n_points
table:columns.description: Number of points included in the applied filter.

table:columns.name: source
table:columns.description: Identifier of the source dataset used for the shoreline extraction.

table:columns.name: box_id
table:columns.description: Identifier for the bounding box in the shoreline system.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Shoreline geometry represented as a geospatial LINESTRING object.

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: Tile key for spatial indexing using the Bing Maps Tile System.

table:columns.name: composite:image_id
table:columns.description: Identifier for the composite image used in shoreline detection.

table:columns.name: composite:start_datetime
table:columns.description: Start timestamp of the composite period for the shoreline observation.

table:columns.name: composite:end_datetime
table:columns.description: End timestamp of the composite period for the shoreline observation.

table:columns.name: composite:determination_datetimes
table:columns.description: Array of timestamps for images used in the composite.

table:columns.name: composite:cloud_cover
table:columns.description: Array of cloud cover percentages for the composite images.

table:columns.name: coastal_zone:buffer_distance
table:columns.description: Buffer distance applied to the coastal zone, in meters.

table:columns.name: coastal_zone:source
table:columns.description: Source used for the coastal zone buffer creation, such as OSM.

data.title: ShorelineMonitor: Satellite-Derived Shorelines
data.description: Parquet dataset with Satellite-Derived Shorelines (SDS) spanning 1984-2024.

table:columns.name: shoreline_id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for the shoreline segment.

table:columns.name: datetime
table:columns.description: Timestamp of the shoreline observation.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Shoreline geometry represented as a geospatial LINESTRING object.

table:columns.name: bbox
table:columns.description: Bounding box of the shoreline segment as a dictionary of xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax.

table:columns.name: quadkey
table:columns.description: Tile key for spatial indexing using the Bing Maps Tile System.

table:columns.name: otsu_threshold
table:columns.description: Threshold value determined by Otsu's method for water detection.

table:columns.name: otsu_separability
table:columns.description: Separability score for land-water classification using Otsu's method.

table:columns.name: sinuosity
table:columns.description: Sinuosity of the shoreline segment.

table:columns.name: self_intersection_density
table:columns.description: Density of self-intersections in the shoreline geometry.

table:columns.name: fractal_dimension
table:columns.description: Fractal dimension of the shoreline geometry.

table:columns.name: filter_length
table:columns.description: Length of the applied filter in the shoreline extraction process.

table:columns.name: filter_n_points
table:columns.description: Number of points included in the applied filter.

table:columns.name: source
table:columns.description: Identifier of the source dataset used for the shoreline extraction.

table:columns.name: box_id
table:columns.description: Identifier for the bounding box in the shoreline system.

table:columns.name: composite:image_id
table:columns.description: Identifier for the composite image used in shoreline detection.

table:columns.name: composite:start_datetime
table:columns.description: Start timestamp of the composite period for the shoreline observation.

table:columns.name: composite:end_datetime
table:columns.description: End timestamp of the composite period for the shoreline observation.

table:columns.name: composite:determination_datetimes
table:columns.description: Array of timestamps for images used in the composite.

table:columns.name: composite:cloud_cover
table:columns.description: Array of cloud cover percentages for the composite images.

table:columns.name: coastal_zone:buffer_distance
table:columns.description: Buffer distance applied to the coastal zone, in meters.

table:columns.name: coastal_zone:source
table:columns.description: Source used for the coastal zone buffer creation, such as OSM.
